name: Ch10BBaseConvo5
_source: speak;Ross;Hey Forde!|Whatcha doing at this shop?|I didn't know you had errands too!
speak;Forde;Ross?!|I was just... uh...|Admiring the craftsmanship of these... tools.
speak;Ross;These look like art supplies to me.|Are you shopping for paintbrushes?
speak;Forde;Well... I suppose there's no use hiding it now.|Yes, I was looking for some new brushes and paints.
speak;Ross;I didn't know knights had time for artsy stuff.|What do you even do with all this?
speak;Forde;I paint, Ross.|It's a way to express myself outside of battle.
speak;Ross;But why?|All these colors and shapes just look weird to me.|What's the point?
speak;Forde;The point?|There's beauty in creating something from nothing!|Art captures moments, feelings, experiences!
speak;Ross;I don't get it.|They're just blobs of color on paper.|How is that useful?
speak;Forde;Not everything has to be "useful" in the way you think!|Art feeds the soul, Ross!|It tells stories without words!
speak;Ross;Stories without words?|That doesn't make any sense.|If you want to tell a story, just use words!
speak;Forde;There are some things that can't be expressed with just words.|Colors, forms, light and shadow can convey feelings that speech cannot.
speak;Ross;I still don't get it.|It's just... weird shapes to me.|Maybe I'm just not smart enough for art.
speak;Forde;It's not about being smart.|It's about being open to seeing the world differently.|But I can see I'm wasting my breath here.
speak;Ross;Sorry, Forde.|I'm better with an axe than a paintbrush anyway.|That's what my dad always says!
speak;Forde;*sigh*|We all have our strengths, I suppose.|Just... don't tell the others about seeing me here, alright?
speak;Ross;Sure thing!|Your secret art hobby is safe with me!|Though I still think it's weird!
